title: Nine Mile
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Caribbean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Casual, full-service restaurant and bar in Historic Montford. Caribbean inspired pasta dishes, rice dishes, traditional pasta dishes, daily specials, and desserts. Uses local organic produce & products whenever possible. Sauces are made in-house and food is cooked to order. Menu denotes which items may be made vegan. Another outlet at 747 Haywood Rd.
